attributes.action: Stop the Draft Communications Data Bill.
attributes.background: The proposed Communications Data Bill is unnecessary, unjust and Orwellian. There is plenty of evidence to suggest that most intelligence work is done without mass surveillance. Internet browsing data is highly private, may be miss-used in the future and will inevitably be accessed and leaked.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105040

or you could decide to sign:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/111448
